page.title: 18OUR CARS
page.content: My dad's car is a Ford Escort Estate Lazer,it does 36 miles per gallon and it was made in Germany.The engine powers the front wheels, it goes approximately 120 miles per hour,it has four cyliders and 70 brake horse power.It has five gears and a reverse gear.The car is silver and has a sun roof.My mum's car is a Citroen 2CV6 it is green and it has three gears and a reverse it does fifty miles per gallon it has a 600cc engine .The car is made in France.The engine powers the front wheels it has 30 brake horse power.The gear stick and hand brake are on the dash board which is different to most cars.
